      • canItemSlotWidgetFit

        default net.minecraft.util.ActionResult canItemSlotWidgetFit(boolean isOnRightSide,
                                                             int left,
                                                             int top,
                                                             T screen,
                                                             java.awt.Rectangle fullBounds)
        Checks if item slot can fit the screen
        Parameters:
        isOnRightSide - whether the user has set the overlay to the right
        left - the left x coordinates of the stack
        top - the top y coordinates for the stack
        screen - the current screen
        fullBounds - the current bounds
        Returns:
        whether the item slot can fit
        See Also:
        for easier api
